column1: #Text=Katara says : " You are the most sexist , immature , nut brained ... I 'm embarrassed to be related to you ! "
#Text=Katara says : " Ever since mom died , I 've been doing all the work around camp while you 've been off playing soldier ! "
#Text=Sokka says : " Uh ... Katara ... " Katara says : " I even wash all the clothes !
#Text=From now on , you 're on your own !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Okay , you 've gone from " weird " to " freakish " , Katara .
#Text=" Katara says : " You mean I did that ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Katara , get back here !
#Text=We do n't know what that thing is !
